item.title: The Art of Reverse Engineering: Uncovering IoT Network Security Vulnerabilities
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "reverse engineering" , "IoT security" , "vulnerabilities" , "security protocols" , "device analysis" , "IoT networks" , "inner workings" , "malicious code" , "encryption measures" , "authentication measures" , "firewalls" , "software update"
